name: Ofelia Sirawian
description: Ofelia is a member of theMaelstromgang, going by the name "Patricia". She warned then-Maelstrom leaderBrickof a member namedRoyce, who she calls a "feral animal", urging Brick to shoot him in the back of his head.In 2077, Patricia acted as contact between Brick andMilitechemployeeAnthony Gilchrist, who started to secretly collaborate with the gang to provide them with details about Militech convoys in order to steal the shipments and get a cut of the profits after selling the goods.Royce would later take over Maelstrom, locking Brick up in a cell. If Brick has been freed duringThe Pickup,...
